title: Bunny and the Grizzly Bear
description: Carson, a Grizzly Bear shifter, is on an undercover assignment for the United Shifter's Alliance when he gets dosed with a powerful aphrodisiac drug and dropped off naked into Bunny's neighborhood!Bunny is the innocent bystander Rabbit shifter whose house is invaded in the middle of the night by a naked Grizzly Bear shifter! Eep! Of course, Bunny is an altruistic soul and just wants to help the hardened Grizzly cop during his time of need!What neither of them counted on was falling in love...Reader Note: This is an adult short story and does contain adult situations and language that is not suitable for young readers. This book is for you if you enjoy a little humor with your spicy romance!
author: Regina Shiderly
